00027 Implemente_instanciable_sans_constructeur(Pave,"Pave",Zone);
00028 // XD bloc_pave objet_lecture nul -1 Class to create a pave.
00029 // XD attr Origine listf Origine 1 Keyword to define the pave (block) origin, that is to say one of the 8 block points (or 4 in a 2D coordinate system).
00030 // XD attr longueurs listf longueurs 1 Keyword to define the block dimensions, that is to say knowing the origin, length along the axes.
00031 // XD attr nombre_de_noeuds listentierf nombre_de_noeuds 1 Keyword to define the discretization (nodenumber) in each direction.
00032 // XD attr facteurs listf facteurs 1 Keyword to define stretching factors for mesh discretization in each direction. This is a real number which must be positive (by default 1.0). A stretching factor other than 1 allows refinement on one edge in one direction.
00033 // XD attr symx rien symx 1 Keyword to define a block mesh that is symmetrical with respect to the YZ plane (respectively Y-axis in 2D) passing through the block centre.
00034 // XD attr symy rien symy 1 Keyword to define a block mesh that is symmetrical with respect to the XZ plane (respectively X-axis in 2D) passing through the block centre.
00035 // XD attr symz rien symz 1 Keyword defining a block mesh that is symmetrical with respect to the XY plane passing through the block centre.
00036 // XD attr xtanh floattant xtanh 1 Keyword to generate mesh with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation in the X-direction.
00037 // XD attr xtanh_dilatation entier(into=[-1,0,1]) xtanh_dilatation 1 Keyword to generate mesh with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation in the X-direction. xtanh_dilatation: The value may be -1,0,1 (0 by default): 0: coarse mesh at the middle of the channel and smaller near the walls -1: coarse mesh at the left side of the channel and smaller at the right side 1: coarse mesh at the right side of the channel and smaller near the left side of the channel.
00038 // XD attr xtanh_taille_premiere_maille floattant xtanh_taille_premiere_maille 1 Size of the first cell of the mesh with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation in the X-direction.
00039 // XD attr ytanh floattant ytanh 1 Keyword to generate mesh with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation in the Y-direction.
00040 // XD attr ytanh_dilatation entier(into=[-1,0,1]) ytanh_dilatation 1 Keyword to generate mesh with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation in the Y-direction. ytanh_dilatation: The value may be -1,0,1 (0 by default): 0: coarse mesh at the middle of the channel and smaller near the walls -1: coarse mesh at the bottom of the channel and smaller near the top 1: coarse mesh at the top of the channel and smaller near the bottom.
00041 // XD attr ytanh_taille_premiere_maille floattant ytanh_taille_premiere_maille 1 Size of the first cell of the mesh with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation in the Y-direction.
00042 // XD attr ztanh floattant ztanh 1 Keyword to generate mesh with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation in the Z-direction.
00043 // XD attr ztanh_dilatation entier(into=[-1,0,1]) ztanh_dilatation 1 Keyword to generate mesh with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation in the Z-direction. tanh_dilatation: The value may be -1,0,1 (0 by default): 0: coarse mesh at the middle of the channel and smaller near the walls -1: coarse mesh at the back of the channel and smaller near the front 1: coarse mesh at the front of the channel and smaller near the back.
00044 // XD attr ztanh_taille_premiere_maille floattant ztanh_taille_premiere_maille 1 Size of the first cell of the mesh with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation in the Z-direction.

00066 Pave::Pave():a_tanh(-123),tanh_dilatation(-123),xa_tanh(-123),xtanh_dilatation(-123),za_tanh(-123),ztanh_dilatation(-123),Nx(-1),Ny(-1),Nz(-1),Mx(-1),My(-1),Mz(-1),tour_complet(-123) {}

00068 // auparavant

00070 // Signification: un flot d'entree
00071 // Valeurs par defaut:
00072 // Contraintes:
00073 // Acces: entree/sortie
00074 // Exception: dimension d'espace necessaire pour mailler
00075 // Exception: accolade ouvrante attendue
00076 // Exception: Symy n'a de sens que pour une dimension >= 2
00077 // Exception: Symz n'a de sens qu'en dimension 3
00078 // Exception: Les facteurs de progression doivent etre positifs
00079 // Exception: Il doit y avoir au moins deux mailles en x
00080 // Exception: accolade ouvrante attendue avant lecture des bords

00107 //! Lit les specifications d'un pave a partir<br>d'un flot d'entree.<br>Le format de lecture d'un pave dans le jeu de donnee est le suivant:<br>Pave nom_pave<br>{<br>Origine OX OY (OZ)<br>Longueurs LX LY (LZ)<br>Nombre_de_noeuds NX NY (NZ)<br>Facteurs Fx Fy (Fz)<br>(Symx)<br>(Symy)<br>(Symz)<br>}<br>{<br>(Bord)  nom X = X0 Y0 <= Y <= Y1 Z0 <= Z <= Z1<br>...<br>(Raccord)  local homogene nom X = X0 Y0 <= Y <= Y1 Z0 <= Z <= Z1<br>...<br>(Internes)  nom X = X0 Y0 <= Y <= Y1 Z0 <= Z <= Z1<br>...<br>(Joint)  nom X = X0 Y0 <= Y <= Y1 Z0 <= Z <= Z1 PE_voisin<br>...<br>}
00108 /** \return Entree\&<br>
00109 Signification: le flot d'entree modifie<br>
00110 Contraintes: */
00111 Entree& Pave::readOn(Entree& is)
00112 {
00113   xtanh_dilatation=0;
00114   tanh_dilatation=0;
00115   ztanh_dilatation=0;
00116   if(dimension<0)
00117     {
00118       Cerr << "You must give the dimension before to mesh" << finl;
00119       Cerr << " The syntax is \"Dimension dim\" " << finl ;
00120       exit();
00121     }
00122   Facteurs.resize(dimension);
00123   Facteurs = 1.;
00124   Symetrique.resize(dimension);
00125   Symetrique=0;
00126   xa_tanh = 10.;
00127   a_tanh = 10.;
00128   za_tanh = 10.;
00129   Origine.resize(dimension);
00130   Longueurs.resize(dimension);
00131   Nb_Noeuds.resize(dimension);
00132   Motcle motlu;
00133   int rang;
00134   tour_complet=0;
00135   rep_VEF=0;
00136 
00137   typer_();
00138 
00139   is >> nom;
00140   Cerr << "Reading of the block " << nom << finl;
00141   is >> motlu;
00142   if (motlu!="{")
00143     {
00144       Cerr << "We expected a { after " << nom << finl;
00145       exit();
00146     }
00147   {
00148     Motcles les_mots(18);
00149     {
00150       les_mots[0]="Origine";
00151       les_mots[1]="Longueurs";
00152       les_mots[2]="Nombre_de_noeuds";
00153       les_mots[3]="Facteurs";
00154       les_mots[4]="Symx";
00155       les_mots[5]="Symy";
00156       les_mots[6]="Symz";
00157       les_mots[7]="xtanh";
00158       les_mots[8]="xtanh_dilatation";
00159       les_mots[9]="xtanh_taille_premiere_maille";
00160       les_mots[10]="ytanh";
00161       les_mots[11]="ytanh_dilatation";
00162       les_mots[12]="ytanh_taille_premiere_maille";
00163       les_mots[13]="ztanh";
00164       les_mots[14]="ztanh_dilatation";
00165       les_mots[15]="ztanh_taille_premiere_maille";
00166       les_mots[16]="reprise_VEF";
00167       les_mots[17]="}";
00168     }
00169     while(motlu != "}")
00170       {
00171         is >> motlu;
00172         rang = les_mots.search(motlu);
00173         switch(rang)
00174           {
00175           case 0:
00176             for(int i=0; i< dimension; i++)
00177               is >> Origine(i);
00178             break;
00179           case 1:
00180             lire_Longueurs(is);
00181             break;
00182           case 2:
00183             lire_Noeuds(is);
00184             break;
00185           case 3:
00186             for(int i=0; i< dimension; i++)
00187               is >> Facteurs(i);
00188             break;
00189           case 4:      //!< Symx
00190             Symetrique(0)=1;
00191             break;
00192           case 5:      //!< Symy
00193             if(dimension<2)
00194               {
00195                 Cerr << "Symy has meaning only in dimension >= 2" << finl;
00196                 exit();
00197               }
00198             Symetrique(1)=1;
00199             break;
00200           case 6:      //!< Symz
00201             if(dimension<3)
00202               {
00203                 Cerr << "Symz has meaning only in dimension >= 3" << finl;
00204                 exit();
00205               }
00206             Symetrique(2)=1;
00207             break;
00208           case 7:
00209             {
00210               is >> xa_tanh;
00211               break;
00212             }
00213           case 8:
00214             {
00215               is >> xtanh_dilatation;
00216               break;
00217             }
00218           case 9:
00219             {
00220               double x1, x_tmp;
00221               is >> x1;
00222               xa_tanh=.1;
00223               double fac_sym;
00224               assert(xtanh_dilatation!=-123);
00225               if (xtanh_dilatation != 0 )
00226                 fac_sym=1.;
00227               else
00228                 fac_sym=2.;
00229               assert(!est_egal(xa_tanh,-123.));
00230               for(int decimale=1; decimale<7; decimale++)
00231                 {
00232                   x_tmp=Longueurs(0)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*1./((Mx-1)*1.))*atanh(xa_tanh))/xa_tanh);
00233                   while ( x_tmp > x1 )
00234                     {
00235                       xa_tanh+=pow(10.,-decimale);
00236                       xa_tanh = min(xa_tanh,1-Objet_U::precision_geom);
00237                       if ( dabs(xa_tanh) < Objet_U::precision_geom)
00238                         {
00239                           Cerr << "Error: The coefficient xa_tanh has a value of : " << xa_tanh << finl ;
00240                           Cerr << "So the mesh can't be generated with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation!" << finl ;
00241                           Cerr << "You must decrease either the xtanh_taille_premiere_maille size of the first cell of the mesh " << finl;
00242                           Cerr << "or the nombre_de_noeuds Nx node number in the X direction." << finl;
00243                           exit();
00244                         }
00245                       x_tmp=Longueurs(0)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*1./((Mx-1)*1.))*atanh(xa_tanh))/xa_tanh);
00246                     }
00247                   xa_tanh-=pow(10.,-decimale);
00248                   xa_tanh = min(xa_tanh,1-Objet_U::precision_geom);
00249                   if ( dabs(xa_tanh) < Objet_U::precision_geom)
00250                     {
00251                       Cerr << "Error: The coefficient xa_tanh has a value of : " << xa_tanh << finl ;
00252                       Cerr << "So the mesh can't be generated with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation!" << finl ;
00253                       Cerr << "You must decrease either the xtanh_taille_premiere_maille size of the first cell of the mesh " << finl;
00254                       Cerr << "or the nombre_de_noeuds Nx node number in the X direction." << finl;
00255                       exit();
00256                     }
00257                 }
00258               Cerr << "The coefficient xa_tanh has a value of : " << xa_tanh << finl ;
00259               break;
00260             }
00261           case 10:
00262             {
00263               is >> a_tanh;
00264               break;
00265             }
00266           case 11:
00267             {
00268               is >> tanh_dilatation;
00269               break;
00270             }
00271           case 12:
00272             {
00273               double y1, y_tmp;
00274               is >> y1;
00275               a_tanh=.1;
00276               double fac_sym;
00277               assert(tanh_dilatation!=-123);
00278               if (tanh_dilatation != 0 )
00279                 fac_sym=1.;
00280               else
00281                 fac_sym=2.;
00282               assert(!est_egal(a_tanh,-123.));
00283               for(int decimale=1; decimale<7; decimale++)
00284                 {
00285                   y_tmp=Longueurs(1)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*1./((My-1)*1.))*atanh(a_tanh))/a_tanh);
00286                   while ( y_tmp > y1 )
00287                     {
00288                       a_tanh+=pow(10.,-decimale);
00289                       a_tanh = min(a_tanh,1-Objet_U::precision_geom);
00290                       if ( dabs(a_tanh) < Objet_U::precision_geom)
00291                         {
00292                           Cerr << "Error: The coefficient ya_tanh has a value of : " << a_tanh << finl ;
00293                           Cerr << "So the mesh can't be generated with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation!" << finl ;
00294                           Cerr << "You must decrease either the ytanh_taille_premiere_maille size of the first cell of the mesh " << finl;
00295                           Cerr << "or the nombre_de_noeuds Ny node number in the Y direction." << finl;
00296                           exit();
00297                         }
00298                       y_tmp=Longueurs(1)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*1./((My-1)*1.))*atanh(a_tanh))/a_tanh);
00299                     }
00300                   a_tanh-=pow(10.,-decimale);
00301                   a_tanh = min(a_tanh,1-Objet_U::precision_geom);
00302                   if ( dabs(a_tanh) < Objet_U::precision_geom)
00303                     {
00304                       Cerr << "Error: The coefficient ya_tanh has a value of : " << a_tanh << finl ;
00305                       Cerr << "So the mesh can't be generated with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation!" << finl ;
00306                       Cerr << "You must decrease either the ytanh_taille_premiere_maille size of the first cell of the mesh " << finl;
00307                       Cerr << "or the nombre_de_noeuds Ny node number in the Y direction." << finl;
00308                       exit();
00309                     }
00310                 }
00311               Cerr << "The coefficient ya_tanh has a value of : " << a_tanh << finl ;
00312               break;
00313             }
00314           case 13:
00315             {
00316               is >> za_tanh;
00317               break;
00318             }
00319           case 14:
00320             {
00321               is >> ztanh_dilatation;
00322               break;
00323             }
00324           case 15:
00325             {
00326               double z1, z_tmp;
00327               is >> z1;
00328               za_tanh=.1;
00329               double fac_sym;
00330               assert(ztanh_dilatation!=-123);
00331               if (ztanh_dilatation != 0 )
00332                 fac_sym=1.;
00333               else
00334                 fac_sym=2.;
00335               assert(!est_egal(za_tanh,-123.));
00336               for(int decimale=1; decimale<7; decimale++)
00337                 {
00338                   z_tmp=Longueurs(2)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*1./((Mz-1)*1.))*atanh(za_tanh))/za_tanh);
00339                   while ( z_tmp > z1 )
00340                     {
00341                       za_tanh+=pow(10.,-decimale);
00342                       za_tanh = min(za_tanh,1-Objet_U::precision_geom);
00343                       if ( dabs(za_tanh) < Objet_U::precision_geom)
00344                         {
00345                           Cerr << "Error: The coefficient za_tanh has a value of : " << za_tanh << finl ;
00346                           Cerr << "So the mesh can't be generated with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation!" << finl ;
00347                           Cerr << "You must decrease either the ztanh_taille_premiere_maille size of the first cell of the mesh " << finl;
00348                           Cerr << "or the nombre_de_noeuds Nz node number in the Z direction." << finl;
00349                           exit();
00350                         }
00351                       z_tmp=Longueurs(2)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*1./((Mz-1)*1.))*atanh(za_tanh))/za_tanh);
00352                     }
00353                   za_tanh-=pow(10.,-decimale);
00354                   za_tanh = min(za_tanh,1-Objet_U::precision_geom);
00355                   if ( dabs(za_tanh) < Objet_U::precision_geom)
00356                     {
00357                       Cerr << "Error: The coefficient za_tanh has a value of : " << za_tanh << finl ;
00358                       Cerr << "So the mesh can't be generated with tanh (hyperbolic tangent) variation!" << finl ;
00359                       Cerr << "You must decrease either the ztanh_taille_premiere_maille size of the first cell of the mesh " << finl;
00360                       Cerr << "or the nombre_de_noeuds Nz node number in the Z direction." << finl;
00361                       exit();
00362                     }
00363                 }
00364               Cerr << "The coefficient za_tanh has a value of : " << za_tanh << finl ;
00365               break;
00366             }
00367           case 16:
00368             {
00369               rep_VEF=1;
00370               break;
00371             }
00372           case 17: //!< Fin
00373             break;
00374           default:
00375             if (motlu == "tanh" || motlu == "tanh_dilatation" || motlu == "tanh_taille_premiere_maille")
00376               {
00377                 Cerr << "Error: '" << motlu << "' keyword is obsolete since V1.7.9. We renamed it to 'Y"<< motlu <<"'" << finl;
00378               }
00379             else
00380               {
00381                 Cerr << motlu << "  is not understood " << finl;
00382                 Cerr << les_mots;
00383               }
00384             exit();
00385           }
00386       }
00387     Pas.resize(dimension);
00388     if(min_array(Facteurs)<=0.)
00389       {
00390         Cerr << "The progression factors must be positives" << finl;
00391         exit();
00392       }
00393     switch(dimension)
00394       {
00395       case 1:
00396         maille1D();
00397         break;
00398       case 2:
00399         maille2D();
00400         break;
00401       case 3:
00402         maille3D();
00403         break;
00404       }
00405   }
00406   if(Mx<2)
00407     {
00408       Cerr << "There must be at least two cells on x" << finl;
00409       exit();
00410     }
00411   if (axi)
00412     {
00413 // Les coordonnees sont modulo 2 pi
00414       double deux_pi=M_PI*2.0 ;
00415       {
00416         int Les_Noeuds_dimension0_opt=Les_Noeuds.dimension(0);
00417         for(int i=0; i<Les_Noeuds_dimension0_opt; i++)
00418           {
00419             Les_Noeuds(i, 1)-=(int) Les_Noeuds(i, 1);
00420             Les_Noeuds(i, 1)*=deux_pi;
00421           }
00422       }
00423 
00424       Longueurs(1)*=deux_pi;
00425       Origine(1)*=deux_pi;
00426     }
00427   {
00428     is >> motlu;
00429     if (motlu!="{")
00430       {
00431         Cerr << "We expected a { before reading the boundaries" << finl;
00432         exit();
00433       }
00434     Motcles les_mots(6);
00435     {
00436       les_mots[0]="Bord";
00437       les_mots[1]="Raccord";
00438       les_mots[2]="Internes";
00439       les_mots[3]="Trou";
00440       les_mots[4]="Joint";
00441       les_mots[5]="}";
00442     }
00443     while(motlu != "}")
00444       {
00445         is >> motlu;
00446         rang = les_mots.search(motlu);
00447         switch(rang)
00448           {
00449           case 0:      //!< Bord
00450             {
00451               Bord& newbord=mes_faces_bord.add(Bord());
00452               lire_front(is , newbord );
00453             }
00454             break;
00455           case 1:      //!< Raccord
00456             {
00457               Raccord& newraccord=mes_faces_raccord.add(Raccord());
00458               Nom type="Raccord_";
00459               Nom local, homogene;
00460               is >> local >> homogene;
00461               type+=local;
00462               type+="_";
00463               type+=homogene;
00464               if (type == "local")
00465                 {
00466                   Cerr << "Do not use sequential local connection!" << finl;
00467                   exit();
00468                 }
00469               newraccord.typer(type);
00470               lire_front(is , newraccord.valeur() );
00471             }
00472             break;
00473           case 2:      //!< Plaques
00474             {
00475               Faces_Interne& faces=mes_faces_int.add(Faces_Interne());
00476               lire_front(is , faces );
00477             }
00478             break;
00479           case 3:      //!< Trous
00480             break;
00481           case 4:      //!< Joint
00482             {
00483               Joint& newjoint=mes_faces_joint.add(Joint());
00484               lire_front(is , newjoint );
00485             }
00486             break;
00487           case 5:      //!< Fin
00488             break;
00489           default:
00490             Cerr << motlu << "  is not understood " << finl;
00491             Cerr << les_mots;
00492             exit();
00493           }
00494       }
00495   }
00496   return is;
00497 }

00500 // Precondition:
00501 // Parametre: Domaine& un_dom
00502 // Signification: le domaine dont fait partie le pave
00503 // Valeurs par defaut:
00504 // Contraintes: reference constante
00505 // Acces: entree
00506 // 
00507 // Signification:
00508 // Contraintes:
00509 // Exception:
00510 // Effets de bord:
00511 // Postcondition:
00512 //
00513 //! Associe un domaine au Pave.
00514 void Pave::associer_domaine(const Domaine& un_dom)
00515 {
00516   Zone::associer_domaine(un_dom);
00517   if(Les_Noeuds.size() > 0)
00518     {
00519 // On copie Les_Noeuds dans le domaine
00520       le_domaine->ajouter(Les_Noeuds, Les_Nums);
00521 // On n'a plus besoin du tableau Les_Noeuds
00522       Les_Noeuds.resize(0,Les_Noeuds.dimension(1));
00523 // On renumerote la zone avec le tableau Les_Nums
00524       renum(Les_Nums);
00525       Les_Nums.resize(0);
00526     }
00527 }

00530 // Precondition:
00531 // Parametre:
00532 // Signification:
00533 // Valeurs par defaut:
00534 // Contraintes:
00535 // Acces:
00536 // 
00537 // Signification:
00538 // Contraintes:
00539 // Exception:
00540 // Effets de bord:
00541 // Postcondition:
00542 //
00543 //
00544 //! Effectue un maillage 1D, du pave<br>avec les valeurs des parametres lus par ReadOn.
00545 void Pave::maille1D()
00546 {
00547   Cerr << "Step of 1D mesh in progress... " << finl;
00548   double epsilon_geom=Objet_U::precision_geom;
00549   int i;
00550   if(Longueurs(0)<0)
00551     {
00552       Origine(0)+=Longueurs(0);
00553       Longueurs(0)=-Longueurs(0);
00554       Facteurs(0)=1./Facteurs(0);
00555     }
00556   if( (!Symetrique(0)) || (dabs(Facteurs(0)-1.)<epsilon_geom)   )
00557     {
00558       if(dabs(Facteurs(0)-1.)>epsilon_geom)
00559         Pas(0)=Longueurs(0)*(Facteurs(0)-1)/(pow(Facteurs(0),Nx)-1);
00560       else
00561         Pas(0)=Longueurs(0)/Nx;
00562       double dx=Pas(0);
00563       double x=Origine(0);
00564       for (i=0; i<Nx; i++)
00565         {
00566           coord_noeud(i)=x;
00567           x+=dx;
00568           dx*=Facteurs(0);
00569         }
00570       coord_noeud(Nx)=Origine(0)+Longueurs(0);
00571     }
00572   else
00573     {
00574       int Ix=Nx/2;
00575       if( (Ix*2)==Nx )
00576         Pas(0)=0.5*Longueurs(0)*(Facteurs(0)-1)/(pow(Facteurs(0),Ix)-1);
00577       else
00578         {
00579           if(Ix)
00580             {
00581               Ix+=1;
00582               Pas(0)=0.5*Longueurs(0)/( (pow(Facteurs(0),Ix-1)-1)/(Facteurs(0)-1)
00583                                         +0.5*pow(Facteurs(0),Ix) );
00584             }
00585           else
00586             {
00587               Ix+=1;
00588               Pas(0)=0;
00589             }
00590         }
00591       double dx=Pas(0);
00592       double x=0;
00593       for (i=0; i<Ix; i++)
00594         {
00595           coord_noeud(i)=Origine(0)+x;
00596           coord_noeud(Nx-i)=Origine(0)+Longueurs(0)-x;
00597           x+=dx;
00598           dx*=Facteurs(0);
00599         }
00600       if( (Ix*2)==Nx )
00601         coord_noeud(Ix)=0.5*(coord_noeud(Ix+1)+coord_noeud(Ix-1));
00602     }
00603   Cerr << finl;
00604   Cerr << "Step of mesh ended " << finl;
00605 }

00608 // Precondition:
00609 // Parametre:
00610 // Signification:
00611 // Valeurs par defaut:
00612 // Contraintes:
00613 // Acces:

00622 //! Effectue un maillage 2D, du pave<br>avec les valeurs des parametres lus par ReadOn.
00623 void Pave::maille2D()
00624 {
00625   Cerr << "Step of 2D mesh in progress... " << finl;
00626   double epsilon_geom=Objet_U::precision_geom;
00627   int i, j;
00628   int pourcent=0;
00629   int tmp;
00630   if(Longueurs(0)<0)
00631     {
00632       Origine(0)+=Longueurs(0);
00633       Longueurs(0)=-Longueurs(0);
00634       Facteurs(0)=1./Facteurs(0);
00635     }
00636   if(Longueurs(1)<0)
00637     {
00638       Origine(1)+=Longueurs(1);
00639       Longueurs(1)=-Longueurs(1);
00640       Facteurs(1)=1./Facteurs(1);
00641     }
00642   if( (!Symetrique(0)) || (dabs(Facteurs(0)-1.)<epsilon_geom) )
00643     {
00644       assert(!est_egal(xa_tanh,-123.));
00645       if ((xa_tanh>epsilon_geom)&&(xa_tanh<1.) )
00646         {
00647           ///!<  Maillage en x en tanh
00648           Cerr << "In if( (xa_tanh>epsilon_geom)&&(xa_tanh<1.) )" << finl;
00649           pourcent =0;
00650           double fac_sym;
00651           assert(xtanh_dilatation!=-123);
00652           if (xtanh_dilatation != 0)
00653             fac_sym=1.;
00654           else
00655             fac_sym=2.;
00656 
00657           if (xtanh_dilatation != -1 )
00658             {
00659               for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
00660                 {
00661                   Cerr << "i=" << i << finl;
00662                   tmp=(i*100)/Mx;
00663                   if(tmp > pourcent)
00664                     {
00665                       pourcent=tmp;
00666                       Cerr << "\rIt was created " << pourcent << "% of coordx" << flush;
00667                     }
00668                   assert(!est_egal(xa_tanh,-123.));
00669                   for (j=0; j<My; j++)
00670                     coord_noeud(i,j,0)=Origine(0)+Longueurs(0)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*i/((Mx-1)*1.))*atanh(xa_tanh))/xa_tanh);
00671                   Cerr << "coord_noeud(0,j,1)=" << coord_noeud(0,j,0) << finl;
00672                   Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordx" << flush;
00673                 }
00674             }
00675           else
00676             {
00677               for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
00678                 {
00679                   Cerr << "i=" << i << finl;
00680                   tmp=(i*100)/Mx;
00681                   if(tmp > pourcent)
00682                     {
00683                       pourcent=tmp;
00684                       Cerr << "\rIt was created " << pourcent << "% of coordx" << flush;
00685                     }
00686                   assert(!est_egal(xa_tanh,-123.));
00687                   for (j=0; j<My; j++)
00688                     coord_noeud(i,j,0)=Origine(0)+Longueurs(0)-Longueurs(0)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*(Mx-1-i)/((Mx-1)*1.))*atanh(xa_tanh))/xa_tanh);
00689                   Cerr << "coord_noeud(0,j,0)=" << coord_noeud(0,j,0) << finl;
00690                   Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordx" << flush;
00691                 }
00692             }
00693 //
00694           for (j=0; j<My; j++)
00695             coord_noeud(0,j,0)=Origine(0);
00696         }
00697       else
00698         {
00699           double x;
00700           for (i=0; i<Nx; i++)
00701             {
00702               tmp=(i*100)/Nx;
00703               if(tmp > pourcent)
00704                 {
00705                   pourcent=tmp;
00706                   Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordx" << flush;
00707                 }
00708               if (dabs(Facteurs(0)-1.)>epsilon_geom)
00709                 x=Origine(0)+Longueurs(0)*(pow(Facteurs(0),i)-1)/(pow(Facteurs(0),Nx)-1);
00710               else
00711                 x=Origine(0)+Longueurs(0)*i/Nx;
00712               for (j=0; j<My; j++)
00713                 coord_noeud(i,j,0)=x;
00714             }
00715           for (j=0; j<My; j++)
00716             coord_noeud(Nx,j,0)=Origine(0)+Longueurs(0);
00717         }
00718     }
00719   else
00720     {
00721       int Ix=Nx/2;
00722       if( (Ix*2)==Nx )
00723         Pas(0)=0.5*Longueurs(0)*(Facteurs(0)-1)/(pow(Facteurs(0),Ix)-1);
00724       else
00725         {
00726           if(Ix)
00727             {
00728               Ix+=1;
00729               Pas(0)=0.5*Longueurs(0)/( (pow(Facteurs(0),Ix-1)-1)/(Facteurs(0)-1)
00730                                         +0.5*pow(Facteurs(0),Ix) );
00731             }
00732           else
00733             {
00734               Ix+=1;
00735               Pas(0)=Longueurs(0);
00736             }
00737         }
00738       double dx=Pas(0);
00739       double x=0;
00740       for (i=0; i<Ix; i++)
00741         {
00742           tmp=(i*100)/Ix;
00743           if(tmp > pourcent)
00744             {
00745               pourcent=tmp;
00746               Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordx" << flush;
00747             }
00748           for (j=0; j<My; j++)
00749             {
00750               coord_noeud(i,j,0)=Origine(0)+x;
00751               coord_noeud(Nx-i,j,0)=Origine(0)+Longueurs(0)-x;
00752             }
00753           x+=dx;
00754           dx*=Facteurs(0);
00755         }
00756       if( (Ix*2)==Nx )
00757         for (j=0; j<My; j++)
00758           coord_noeud(Ix,j,0)=0.5*(coord_noeud(Ix+1,j,0)
00759                                    +coord_noeud(Ix-1,j,0));
00760     }
00761   pourcent=0;
00762 // 
00763   if( (!Symetrique(1)) || (dabs(Facteurs(1)-1.)<epsilon_geom) )
00764     {
00765       assert(!est_egal(a_tanh,-123.));
00766       if ((a_tanh>epsilon_geom)&&(a_tanh<1.) )
00767         {
00768           ///!<  Maillage en y en tanh
00769           Cerr << "In if( (a_tanh>epsilon_geom)&&(a_tanh<1.) )" << finl;
00770           pourcent =0;
00771           double fac_sym;
00772           assert(tanh_dilatation!=-123);
00773           if (tanh_dilatation != 0)
00774             fac_sym=1.;
00775           else
00776             fac_sym=2.;
00777 
00778           if (tanh_dilatation != -1 )
00779             {
00780               for (j=0; j<My; j++)
00781                 {
00782                   Cerr << "j=" << j << finl;
00783                   tmp=(j*100)/My;
00784                   if(tmp > pourcent)
00785                     {
00786                       pourcent=tmp;
00787                       Cerr << "\rIt was created " << pourcent << "% of coordy" << flush;
00788                     }
00789                   assert(!est_egal(a_tanh,-123.));
00790                   for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
00791                     coord_noeud(i,j,1)=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*j/((My-1)*1.))*atanh(a_tanh))/a_tanh);
00792                   Cerr << "coord_noeud(0,j,1)=" << coord_noeud(0,j,1) << finl;
00793                   Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordy" << flush;
00794                 }
00795             }
00796           else
00797             {
00798               for (j=0; j<My; j++)
00799                 {
00800                   Cerr << "j=" << j << finl;
00801                   tmp=(j*100)/My;
00802                   if(tmp > pourcent)
00803                     {
00804                       pourcent=tmp;
00805                       Cerr << "\rIt was created " << pourcent << "% of coordy" << flush;
00806                     }
00807                   assert(!est_egal(a_tanh,-123.));
00808                   for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
00809                     coord_noeud(i,j,1)=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1)-Longueurs(1)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*(My-1-j)/((My-1)*1.))*atanh(a_tanh))/a_tanh);
00810                   Cerr << "coord_noeud(0,j,1)=" << coord_noeud(0,j,1) << finl;
00811                   Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordy" << flush;
00812                 }
00813             }
00814 //
00815           for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
00816             coord_noeud(i,0,1)=Origine(1);
00817         }
00818       else
00819         {
00820           double y;
00821           for (j=0; j<Ny; j++)
00822             {
00823               tmp=(j*100)/Ny;
00824               if(tmp > pourcent)
00825                 {
00826                   pourcent=tmp;
00827                   Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordy" << flush;
00828                 }
00829               if (dabs(Facteurs(1)-1.)>epsilon_geom)
00830                 y=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1)*(pow(Facteurs(1),j)-1)/(pow(Facteurs(1),Ny)-1);
00831               else
00832                 y=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1)*j/Ny;
00833               for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
00834                 coord_noeud(i,j,1)=y;
00835             }
00836           for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
00837             coord_noeud(i,j,1)=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1);
00838         }
00839     }
00840   else
00841     {
00842       int Iy=Ny/2;
00843       if( (Iy*2)==Ny )
00844         Pas(1)=0.5*Longueurs(1)*(Facteurs(1)-1)/(pow(Facteurs(1),Iy)-1);
00845       else
00846         {
00847           if(Iy)
00848             {
00849               Iy+=1;
00850               Pas(1)=0.5*Longueurs(1)/( (pow(Facteurs(1),Iy-1)-1)/(Facteurs(1)-1)
00851                                         +0.5*pow(Facteurs(1),Iy) );
00852             }
00853           else
00854             {
00855               Iy+=1;
00856               Pas(1)=Longueurs(1);
00857             }
00858         }
00859       double dy=Pas(1);
00860       double y=0;
00861       for (j=0; j<Iy; j++)
00862         {
00863           tmp=(j*100)/Iy;
00864           if(tmp > pourcent)
00865             {
00866               pourcent=tmp;
00867               Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordy" << flush;
00868             }
00869           for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
00870             {
00871               coord_noeud(i,j,1)=Origine(1)+y;
00872               coord_noeud(i,Ny-j,1)=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1)-y;
00873             }
00874           y+=dy;
00875           dy*=Facteurs(1);
00876         }
00877       if( (Iy*2)==Ny )
00878         for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
00879           coord_noeud(i,Iy,1)=0.5*(coord_noeud(i,Iy-1,1)
00880                                    +coord_noeud(i,Iy+1,1));
00881     }
00882   Cerr << finl;
00883   Cerr << "Step of mesh ended " << finl;
00884 }

01089             {
01090               for (j=0; j<My; j++)
01091                 {
01092                   Cerr << "j=" << j << finl;
01093                   tmp=(j*100)/My;
01094                   if(tmp > pourcent)
01095                     {
01096                       pourcent=tmp;
01097                       Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordy" << flush;
01098                     }
01099                   assert(!est_egal(a_tanh,-123.));
01100                   for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01101                     for (k=0; k<Mz; k++)
01102                       coord_noeud(i,j,k,1)=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1)-Longueurs(1)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*(My-1-j)/((My-1)*1.))*atanh(a_tanh))/a_tanh);
01103 
01104                   Cerr << "coord_noeud(0,j,0,1)=" << coord_noeud(0,j,0,1) << finl;
01105                 }
01106             }
01107           for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01108             for (k=0; k<Mz; k++)
01109               coord_noeud(i,0,k,1)=Origine(1);
01110         }
01111 //
01112       else
01113         {
01114           double y;
01115           for (j=0; j<Ny; j++)
01116             {
01117               tmp=(j*100)/Ny;
01118               if(tmp > pourcent)
01119                 {
01120                   pourcent=tmp;
01121                   Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordy" << flush;
01122                 }
01123               if(dabs(Facteurs(1)-1.)>epsilon_geom)
01124                 y=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1)*(pow(Facteurs(1),j)-1)/(pow(Facteurs(1),Ny)-1);
01125               else
01126                 y=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1)*j/Ny;
01127 
01128               for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01129                 for (k=0; k<Mz; k++)
01130                   coord_noeud(i,j,k,1)=y;
01131             }
01132           for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01133             for (k=0; k<Mz; k++)
01134               coord_noeud(i,j,k,1)=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1);
01135         }
01136     }
01137   else
01138     {
01139       int Iy=Ny/2;
01140       if( (Iy*2)==Ny )
01141         Pas(1)=0.5*Longueurs(1)*(Facteurs(1)-1)/(pow(Facteurs(1),Iy)-1);
01142       else
01143         {
01144           if(Iy)
01145             {
01146               Iy+=1;
01147               Pas(1)=0.5*Longueurs(1)/( (pow(Facteurs(1),Iy-1)-1)/(Facteurs(1)-1)
01148                                         +0.5*pow(Facteurs(1),Iy) );
01149             }
01150           else
01151             {
01152               Iy+=1;
01153               Pas(1)=Longueurs(1);
01154             }
01155         }
01156       double dy=Pas(1);
01157       double y=0;
01158       for (j=0; j<Iy; j++)
01159         {
01160           tmp=(j*100)/Iy;
01161           if(tmp > pourcent)
01162             {
01163               pourcent=tmp;
01164               Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordy" << flush;
01165             }
01166           for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01167             for (k=0; k<Mz; k++)
01168               {
01169                 coord_noeud(i,j,k,1)=Origine(1)+y;
01170                 coord_noeud(i,Ny-j,k,1)=Origine(1)+Longueurs(1)-y;
01171               }
01172           y+=dy;
01173           dy*=Facteurs(1);
01174         }
01175       if( (Iy*2)==Ny )
01176         for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01177           for (k=0; k<Mz; k++)
01178             coord_noeud(i,Iy,k,1)=0.5*(coord_noeud(i,Iy-1,k,1)
01179                                        +coord_noeud(i,Iy+1,k,1));
01180     }
01181 // 
01182   pourcent=0;
01183   Cerr << finl;
01184   if( (!Symetrique(2)) ||( dabs(Facteurs(2)-1.)<epsilon_geom)    )
01185     {
01186       assert(!est_egal(za_tanh,-123.));
01187       if ((za_tanh>epsilon_geom)&&(za_tanh<1.) )
01188         {
01189           ///!<  Maillage en z en tanh
01190           Cerr << "In if( (za_tanh>epsilon)&&(za_tanh<1.) )" << finl;
01191           pourcent =0;
01192           double fac_sym;
01193           assert(ztanh_dilatation!=-123);
01194           if (ztanh_dilatation != 0)
01195             fac_sym=1.;
01196           else
01197             fac_sym=2.;
01198 
01199           if (ztanh_dilatation != -1 )
01200             {
01201               for (k=0; k<Mz; k++)
01202                 {
01203                   Cerr << "k=" << k << finl;
01204                   tmp=(k*100)/Mz;
01205                   if(tmp > pourcent)
01206                     {
01207                       pourcent=tmp;
01208                       Cerr << "\rIt was created " << pourcent << "% of coordz" << flush;
01209                     }
01210                   assert(!est_egal(za_tanh,-123.));
01211                   for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01212                     for (j=0; j<My; j++)
01213                       coord_noeud(i,j,k,2)=Origine(2)+Longueurs(2)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*k/((Mz-1)*1.))*atanh(za_tanh))/za_tanh);
01214                   Cerr << "coord_noeud(0,0,k,2)=" << coord_noeud(0,0,k,2) << finl;
01215                 }
01216             }
01217           else
01218             {
01219               for (k=0; k<Mz; k++)
01220                 {
01221                   Cerr << "k=" << k << finl;
01222                   tmp=(k*100)/Mz;
01223                   if(tmp > pourcent)
01224                     {
01225                       pourcent=tmp;
01226                       Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordz" << flush;
01227                     }
01228                   assert(!est_egal(za_tanh,-123.));
01229                   for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01230                     for (j=0; j<My; j++)
01231                       coord_noeud(i,j,k,2)=Origine(2)+Longueurs(2)-Longueurs(2)/fac_sym*(1.+tanh((-1.+fac_sym*(Mz-1-k)/((Mz-1)*1.))*atanh(za_tanh))/za_tanh);
01232 
01233                   Cerr << "coord_noeud(0,0,k,2)=" << coord_noeud(0,0,k,2) << finl;
01234                 }
01235             }
01236           for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01237             for (j=0; j<My; j++)
01238               coord_noeud(i,j,0,2)=Origine(2);
01239         }
01240 //
01241       else
01242         {
01243           double z;
01244           for (k=0; k<Nz; k++)
01245             {
01246               tmp=(k*100)/Nz;
01247               if(tmp > pourcent)
01248                 {
01249                   pourcent=tmp;
01250                   Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordz" << flush;
01251                 }
01252               if(dabs(Facteurs(2)-1.)>epsilon_geom)
01253                 z=Origine(2)+Longueurs(2)*(pow(Facteurs(2),k)-1)/(pow(Facteurs(2),Nz)-1);
01254               else
01255                 z=Origine(2)+Longueurs(2)*k/Nz;
01256               for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01257                 for (j=0; j<My; j++)
01258                   coord_noeud(i,j,k,2)=z;
01259             }
01260           for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01261             for (j=0; j<My; j++)
01262               coord_noeud(i,j,Nz,2)=Origine(2)+Longueurs(2);
01263         }
01264     }
01265   else
01266     {
01267       int Iz=Nz/2;
01268       if( (Iz*2)==Nz )
01269         Pas(2)=0.5*Longueurs(2)*(Facteurs(2)-1)/(pow(Facteurs(2),Iz)-1);
01270       else
01271         {
01272           if(Iz)
01273             {
01274               Iz+=1;
01275               Pas(2)=0.5*Longueurs(2)/( (pow(Facteurs(2),Iz-1)-1)/(Facteurs(2)-1)
01276                                         +0.5*pow(Facteurs(2),Iz) );
01277             }
01278           else
01279             {
01280               Iz+=1;
01281               Pas(2)=Longueurs(2);
01282             }
01283         }
01284       double dz=Pas(2);
01285       double z=0;
01286       for (k=0; k<Iz; k++)
01287         {
01288           tmp=(k*100)/Iz;
01289           if(tmp > pourcent)
01290             {
01291               pourcent=tmp;
01292               Cerr << "It was created " << pourcent << "% of coordz" << flush;
01293             }
01294           for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01295             for (j=0; j<My; j++)
01296               {
01297                 coord_noeud(i,j,k,2)=Origine(2)+z;
01298                 coord_noeud(i,j,Nz-k,2)=Origine(2)+Longueurs(2)-z;
01299               }
01300           z+=dz;
01301           dz*=Facteurs(2);
01302         }
01303       if( (Iz*2)==Nz )
01304         for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01305           for (j=0; j<My; j++)
01306             coord_noeud(i,j,Iz,2)=0.5*(coord_noeud(i,j,Iz+1,2)
01307                                        +coord_noeud(i,j,Iz-1,2));
01308     }
01309 
01310 
01311 // PaQ : pour pouvoir passer d'un maillage VDF a VEF suivant tetraedriser homogene
01312 
01313   if(rep_VEF)
01314     {
01315       for (j=1; j<My; j+=2)
01316         for (i=0; i<Mx; i++)
01317           for (k=0; k<Mz; k++)
01318             coord_noeud(i,j,k,1)=coord_noeud(i,j-1,k,1)+0.5*(coord_noeud(i,j+1,k,1)-coord_noeud(i,j-1,k,1));
01319     }
01320 
01321 
01322   Cerr << finl;
01323   Cerr << "Step of mesh ended " << finl;
01324 }

01327 // Precondition:
01328 // Parametre:
01329 // Signification:
01330 // Valeurs par defaut:
01331 // Contraintes:
01332 // Acces:
01333 // 
01334 // Signification:
01335 // Contraintes:
01336 // Exception:
01337 // Effets de bord:
01338 // Postcondition:
01339 //
01340 //
01341 //
01342 //
01343 //
01344 //
01345 //! Type le pave suivant la dimension d'espace<br>et suivant le repere de coordonnees demande (cylindrique<br>ou cartesien)<br>En dimension 1      : le pave est maille avec des segments<br>En dimension 2 (axi): la pave est maille avec des rectangle (axi)<br>En dimension 3 (axi): la pave est maille avec des hexaedres (axi)
01346 void Pave::typer_()
01347 {
01348   switch(dimension)
01349     {
01350     case 1:
01351       typer("Segment");
01352       break;
01353     case 2:
01354       if (axi)
01355         typer("Rectangle_Axi");
01356       else if (bidim_axi)
01357         typer("Rectangle_2D_Axi");
01358       else
01359         typer("Rectangle");
01360       break;
01361     case 3:
01362       if (axi)
01363         typer("Hexaedre_Axi");
01364       else
01365         typer("Hexaedre");
01366       break;
01367     default :
01368       break;
01369     }
01370 }

01372 // Precondition:
01373 // Parametre: Entree& is
01374 // Signification: un flot d'entree
01375 // Valeurs par defaut:
01376 // Contraintes:
01377 // Acces: entree/sortie
01378 // 
01379 // Signification:
01380 // Contraintes:
01381 // Exception: La Longueur est en nombre de tour en axi, comprise entre 0 et 1
01382 // Effets de bord:
01383 // Postcondition:
01384 //
01385 //
01386 //
01387 //! Lit les longueurs LX LY [LZ] du jeu de donnee<br>a partir d'un flot d'entree.<br>Methode appelee par readOn(Entree\&)
01388 void Pave::lire_Longueurs(Entree& is)
01389 {
01390   int i;
01391   for(i=0; i< dimension; i++)
01392     is >> Longueurs(i);
01393   if(axi)
01394     {
01395       if(Longueurs(1) >1.+epsilon())
01396         {
01397           Cerr << "The length \"Longueurs\" is in number of turns in axisymmetric" << finl;
01398           Cerr << "It must be between 0 and 1" << finl;
01399           exit();
01400         }
01401       else if(Longueurs(1)==1.)
01402         tour_complet=1;
01403     }
01404 }
01405 
01406 // Precondition:
01407 // Parametre: Entree& is
01408 // Signification: un flot d'entree
01409 // Valeurs par defaut:
01410 // Contraintes:
01411 // Acces: entree/sortie
01412 // 
01413 // Signification:
01414 // Contraintes:
01415 // Exception: en coordonnees axi il faut lire les longueurs d'abord
01416 // Exception: dimension d'espace non prevue
01417 // Effets de bord:
01418 // Postcondition:
01419 //
01420 //
01421 //
01422 //! Lit le nombre de noeuds dans le jeu de donnee<br>a partir d'un flot d'entree et construit les noeuds.<br>Methode appelee par readOn(Entree\&)
01423 void Pave::lire_Noeuds(Entree& is)
01424 {
01425   int i, j, k;
01426   if( (axi) && (Longueurs(0)==0.))
01427     {
01428       Cerr<< "You must first read the length in axisymmetric!" << finl;
01429       exit();
01430     }
01431   for(i=0; i< dimension; i++)
01432     is >> Nb_Noeuds(i);
01433   if (min_array(Nb_Noeuds)<2)
01434     {
01435       Cerr << "\nError: The number of nodes in directions Nx and Ny (and Nz) for 'Pave " << nom << "' must be greater than 1." << finl;
01436       Cerr << "If you want to define a unique cell in a given direction, set the number of nodes to 2 in that direction." << finl;
01437       exit();
01438     }
01439   if(dimension==1)
01440     {
01441       Mx=Nb_Noeuds(0);
01442       Nx=Nb_Noeuds(0)-1;
01443       mes_elems.resize(Nx,2);
01444       Les_Noeuds.resize(Mx);
01445       for (i=0; i<Nx; i++)
01446         {
01447           maille_sommet(i,0)=numero_sommet(i);
01448           maille_sommet(i,1)=numero_sommet(i+1);
01449         }
01450     }
01451   else if(dimension==2)
01452     {
01453       Mx=Nb_Noeuds(0);
01454       My=Nb_Noeuds(1);
01455       Nx=Nb_Noeuds(0)-1;
01456       Ny=Nb_Noeuds(1)-1;
01457       assert(tour_complet!=-123);
01458       if(tour_complet) Ny++;
01459       mes_elems.resize(Nx*Ny,4);
01460       Les_Noeuds.resize(Mx*My,2);
01461       for (i=0; i<Nx; i++)
01462         for (j=0; j<Ny; j++)
01463           {
01464             maille_sommet(i,j,0)=numero_sommet(i, j);
01465             maille_sommet(i,j,1)=numero_sommet(i+1, j);
01466             maille_sommet(i,j,2)=numero_sommet(i, j+1);
01467             maille_sommet(i,j,3)=numero_sommet(i+1, j+1);
01468           }
01469     }
01470   else if(dimension==3)
01471     {
01472       Mx=Nb_Noeuds(0);
01473       My=Nb_Noeuds(1);
01474       Mz=Nb_Noeuds(2);
01475       Nx=Nb_Noeuds(0)-1;
01476       Ny=Nb_Noeuds(1)-1;
01477       Nz=Nb_Noeuds(2)-1;
01478       assert(tour_complet!=-123);
01479       if(tour_complet) Ny++;
01480       mes_elems.resize(Nx*Ny*Nz,8);
01481       Les_Noeuds.resize(Mx*My*Mz,3);
01482       for (i=0; i<Nx; i++)
01483         for ( j=0; j<Ny; j++)
01484           for ( k=0; k<Nz; k++)
01485             {
01486               maille_sommet(i,j,k,0)=numero_sommet(i, j, k);
01487               maille_sommet(i,j,k,1)=numero_sommet(i+1, j, k);
01488               maille_sommet(i,j,k,2)=numero_sommet(i, j+1, k);
01489               maille_sommet(i,j,k,3)=numero_sommet(i+1, j+1, k);
01490               maille_sommet(i,j,k,4)=numero_sommet(i, j, k+1);
01491               maille_sommet(i,j,k,5)=numero_sommet(i+1, j, k+1);
01492               maille_sommet(i,j,k,6)=numero_sommet(i, j+1, k+1);
01493               maille_sommet(i,j,k,7)=numero_sommet(i+1, j+1, k+1);
01494             }
01495     }
01496   else
01497     {
01498       Cerr << "dimension = " << dimension << "not provided " << finl;
01499       exit();
01500     }
01501 }
